body:
Stage.fetch does not set the 'expand' kwarg for mirror URL fetchers so when retrieving a resource which should not be expanded from a mirror it will fail.

For an example see conversation at https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/1233

In summary: the spack cache is a mirror so this can be created simply by installing, uninstalling, and attempting to reinstall (which triggers the error).
title: mirror URL fetchers do not set 'expand'
